amendment.description: Amendment provides $3 million to the National Oceanographic and Atmospheric Administration to address the problem of the toxic organism pfiesteria and $1 million for the Coastal Nonpoint Source Pollution Control Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide $3 million in funding for the National Oceanographic and Atmospheric Administration to address the problem of of Pfister and $1 million for the Coastal Nonpoint Source Polution Control Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rogers amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.
